1: Halleluyah! Praise God in His Sanctuary! Praise Him in His mighty expanse.
2: Praise Him for His acts of power. Praise Him for His enormous greatness.
3: Praise Him with the blast of the shofar. Praise Him with harp and lyre.
4: Praise Him with tambourine and dance. Praise Him with string instruments and flute.
5: Praise Him with clash of cymbals. Praise Him with resounding cymbals.
6: Let every thing that has breath praise Adonai. Halleluyah!
